text:

exception message

Test on 2.13,3.0,nightly build(apache-jmeter-r1766435),all have the problem

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Could you provide the chinese character that triggers the problem ? 
I suggest you also open a bug here:

- https://github.com/bobbylight/RSyntaxTextArea

Regards

(In reply to Eric zhao from comment #2)
> 测试

Hi,
I have tested with current nightly build, I don't reproduce the issue.

I am using last Java 8 version 1.8_u112.

Do you reproduce with nightly build or 3.1RC3 ?
Could you check the encoding you're using on your system ?

Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
(In reply to Philippe Mouawad from comment #3)
> (In reply to Eric zhao from comment #2)
> > 测试
> 
> Hi,
> I have tested with current nightly build, I don't reproduce the issue.
> 
> I am using last Java 8 version 1.8_u112.
> 
> Do you reproduce with nightly build or 3.1RC3 ?
> Could you check the encoding you're using on your system ?
>

Note that I am not able to reproduce it using 3.0 and even an old Java jdk1.7.0_25.

So I think it may be due to your system encoding or font.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
